## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Who is affected?

## Proposed Solution

Describe the feature and how it would work.

## Alignment with Core Principles

How does this feature support OpenDemocracy's principles (neutrality, privacy, transparency, decentralization)?

## Alternatives Considered

What other approaches did you consider, and why is this one preferred?

## Additional Context

Any mockups, references, or related issues.
